english: The subsequent revisions should be computerized .
chinese: 随后的修正本应当用电子计算机处理。

english: For the next 40 years debtors were subject to state laws .
chinese: 随后的四十年中，债务人受州法律的保护。

english: But incomplete adjuvant is adequate for subsequent injections .
chinese: 但随后的注射则以使用不完全佐剂为宜。

english: For the following week a deadly hush settled in the pacific .
chinese: 在随后的一个星期中，太平洋上如死一般的沉寂。

english: For the next two days carrie indulged in the most high-flown speculations .
chinese: 随后的两天里，嘉利沉入了非非的幻想。
随後的造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: In the following three years he became an active political figure .
chinese: 在随后的三年中，他一跃而成了一位活跃的风云人物。

english: Cohort analysis traces the subsequent vital history of such cohorts .
chinese: 对同批人进行分析能追溯出这种同批人随后的重大历史。

english: In the ensuing years, sam worked for his brother as foreman, subeditor, and feature writer .
chinese: 随后的几年里，塞姆在哥哥手下当过工头，助理编辑和特写记者。

english: In the following years, sam worked for his brother as foreman, subeditor, and feature writer .
chinese: 随后的几年里，塞姆在哥哥的手下当过工头，助理编辑和特写记者。

english: They spent the next few days learning things about each other which they had not had time for previously .
chinese: 随后的几天，他们继续互相了解着，这是以前他们没来得急做的事。

english: Makers of dictionaries are inevitably trapped on occasion into stating apparently eternal truths to which time later gives the lie .
chinese: 词典编者有时不免自找麻烦地去说明某些表面看来系永恒的现象，但随后的岁月证实它们并非如此。

english: In this model, the resulting implosion and ensuing explosion would blow off the outer envelope of the star and leave behind the core as a neutron star .
chinese: 按此模型，引起的突然压缩和随后的爆发会把恒量的外部包层吹跑，留下的核成为一颗中子星。

english: In the following days he often came to see us
chinese: 在随后的日子里，他经常来看我们。

english: He expects to be fitted for it in the next few weeks
chinese: 他希望可以在随后的几周内装好。

english: The first and all subsequent visits were kept secret
chinese: 第一次及随后的访问均严守秘密。
